definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)

sentences.english: SPECT imaging will demonstrate decreased radiotracer uptake in the frontal and temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: SPECT成像显示额颞叶放射性摄取减低。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海带摄取的营养物质和海带多糖的量极少。

sentences.english: How much procyanidins would you have to consume to feel the benefits?
sentences.chinese: 人体必须摄取多少原花青素才能起作用？

sentences.english: Debate has raged over whether taking supplements might provide the body with an extra boost.
sentences.chinese: 摄取补品是否能够增强体质的争论已经炽热化。

sentences.english: The food we take is broken down into useful substance .
sentences.chinese: 我们摄取的食物被分解成用的物质。

sentences.english: Your brain needs you to eat healthy fats.
sentences.chinese: 你的大脑需要你摄取健康的脂肪。

sentences.english: Ingestion or intentional inhalation of solvent vapors can be harmful or fatal.
sentences.chinese: 摄取或故意吸入溶剂蒸汽可能有害甚至致命。

sentences.english: They can detox program in seven days after the intake of milk dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 大可以在七天牛奶排毒计画后开始摄取奶类制品。

sentences.english: Siku relied on his much smaller video camera — the one in his mobile phone — to get the images.
sentences.chinese: 西库利用移动电话上的小型摄影机摄取图像。

sentences.english: Note the 2 large foci of red-colored activity in the sites of 201-Tl uptake.
sentences.chinese: 注意图中被摄取的部位中有两个大的红色活动焦点。

sentences.english: The uptake of choline was also competitively inhibited by ethanolamine.
sentences.chinese: 乙醇胺竞争性地抑制胆碱摄取，且存在剂量依赖关系。

sentences.english: This was shot in Chobe Reserve in Botswana.
sentences.chinese: 这照片摄取在博茨瓦纳丘比保护区。

sentences.english: Takes the form of diarrhoea following ingestion of the oil in the flesh and bones of gempylids.
sentences.chinese: 在摄取带䲠鱼肉跟骨头内的油脂后，引起腹泄的形式。

sentences.english: The nitrogen balance technique measures nitrogen intake and nitrogen excretion.
sentences.chinese: 氮平衡技术能够测量出氮摄取量与氮排泄量。

sentences.english: Some phenolics , if consumed in small amounts, are believed to lower the risk of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 苯酚少量的摄取，据相信是可以降低心脏疾病的风险。

sentences.english: I'm sure you don't need another lecture on the dangers of excess sugar consumption.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定你不想再听一遍过量摄取糖份的危害了。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
